item.title: Learning symmetries via weight-sharing with doubly stochastic tensors
item.description: Learn data symmetries directly from data with flexible weight-sharing using learnable doubly stochastic tensors!

item.title: VISA: Variational Inference with Sequential Sample-Average Approximations
item.description: VISA, a new variational inference method, significantly speeds up approximate inference for complex models by reusing model evaluations across multiple gradient steps, achieving comparable accuracy wi…
